ygData.subject: Re: Abandon Ship
ygData.msgSnippet: Starscream flew slowly around until he came to the escape hatch. He opened it and flew outside. He went a bit far out. Close enough so that they can rush back

Starscream flew slowly around until he came to the escape hatch. He 
opened it and flew outside. He went a bit far out. Close enough so 
that they can rush back later, but far enough that another explosion 
wouldn't hurt them. It occured to Starscream that he could kill 
Drillbit right now. Eject the Cockpit and and detonate it. KitKat 
would start to mourn, and he would be there to comfort her, and they 
would fall in love. And no one would know he had killed Drillbit. He 
could explain it as a program malfunction. No! He promised that he 
would leave them together, no matter the circumstance. He stuffed the 
urge to kill Drillbit away deep inside and hovered as the ship went 
crashing. He talked to Drillbit.

"So what do we do now? We've lost the base, we've lost the ship. 
We've got nothing left. I read something about another Pred base 
around here, but I think it's from another faction. We're nomads, and 
just sitting ducks for the next Chosen One attack. What do we do?"
